subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson overcame an early bogey and some missed chances with seven birdies in his last 13 holes for a five-under 65 that put him at 12-under 198.
snippet: Phil Mickelson overcame an early bogey and some missed chances with seven birdies in his last 13 holes for a five-under 65 that put him at 12-under 198.
